title: What are examples of evolutionary relationships among organisms using the evidence of evolution? - Quora

response.answer_text: A good one is the koala’s relationship with eucalyptus trees. The tree started developing into a poisonous plant over time, and the koala developed a tolerance for the toxin so that eucalyptus could remain its staple of choice.

There is no evidence. What has been seen is that each kind of life form never had common ancestors with another kind of life form. Each had their own individual ancestors. (for those which have a male and female as parents.)
